title: heroes tonight
lyrics: Tone chuan la Ab. Capo 1 choi G. Tone …I’m walking alone, the streets are empty The only thing I can see is my own silhouette I’m getting stronger step by step The clock is ticking but there is no time for regrets I’ve been flying from town to town From London to Taiwan I’ve been all around the globe Trying to protect your soul We are heroes tonight. We will fly above the sky We are heroes tonight, yeahhhhhhhhh hhhhhh… We are heroes tonight. We will fly above the sky We are heroes tonight, yeahhhhhhhhh hhhhhh… Dạo vòng hợp âm:(  ) Nighttt ttttt … yeahhh I’m feeling like a dyna mite Ready to explode right up in the sky I need you to listen I need you to hear And don’t show any fear I’ve been flying from town to town From London to Taiwan I’ve been all around the globe Trying to protect your soul We are heroes tonight. We will fly above the sky We are heroes tonight, yeahhhhhhhhh hhhhhh… We are heroes tonight. We will fly above the sky We are heroes tonight, yeahhhhhhhhh hhhhhh… Dạo vòng hợp âm:(  ) Nighttt ttttt … yeahhh We are heroes tonight. We will fly above the sky We are heroes tonight, yeahhhhhhhhh hhhhhh… I’ve been flying from town to town From London to Taiwan I’ve been all around the globe Trying to protect your soul
